function CreateUnitsForPlayer0 takes unit u returns boolean
    // comment
    local unit u = CreateUnit( p, "hrif", 379.5, -619.2, 147.716 )
    local integer unitID = 71
    local trigger t = rr_SomeOtherTrigger
    local real life = 55.52
    
    set u = CreateUnit( p, 'hrif', 379.5, -619.2, 147.716 )
    
    call CreateUnit( p, 'hfoo', 355, 322, 180 )
    call DoSomething( GetUnit( GenerateUnit() ), GetUnitId('hfoo') )
    
    local unit myNewUnit = CreateUnit(Player(15), 'uloc', 0, 0, 0)
endfunction
